button.signup: Not yet a member? Click here and sign up!

button_tour.title: Another round!
button_tour.content: Click it and you will take the tour of this app

0.question: What is the aim of this app?
0.answer: Click the button below and find out for who is designed this app

1.question: Can I see again the tour of the app?
1.answer: Certainly, you can click the button below and start a tour.

2.question: What does user status mean?
2.answer: It describes your subscription, if you have a subscription you will see the status 'active' otherwise 'not active'. Remember if your status is 'not active' your alert emergency alert will be ignored by operator!

form.content: Would you like to contact the following numbers? (without direct responsibility)

pairing.title: Pairing
pairing.content: Keep press your smart jewelry and then press the button below to pair it with the app by clicking the label called AMPERE (swipe to delete device or edit the name). In an emergency situation you can keep press the jewel for at least 5 seconds and send an emergency alert

battery.title: Test Battery
battery.content: Stay in this page and keep your phone and jewel close; click the button on the jewel and check if the app sends a test alert.

SHOW_ALERT.content: Accidentally triggered? No problem,enter your PIN to cancel. To send a message, please let the time expire or click the button above
SHOW_ALERT.error: Error. I can't send emergency alert!!

0.title: Welcome
0.content: This app is for those who want to feel safe at all times, if you are in trouble you can keep press the charm for at least 5 seconds to send an S.O.S. with your location

1.title: How it works
1.content: During the registartion you can insert up to 5 contats and in an emergency case, if you have a subscription, the operator will call all contacts setted during registration, operator can also call some public emergency numbers if you have enabled it in the registration phase.

2.title: Other features
2.content: If you usually forget how to take a medicine you can ask for an NFC-tag or a QRCode and simple scanning it you can see in the app all the procedure. In general you can personalize the code and see what you want

3.title: Ready to join?
3.content: You can sign up for free trial without subscription, but remember that in this case your alerts will be rejected!

homepage.title: Welcome!
homepage.content: In this tour you will explore the features of this app

qr.title: QR
qr.content: Here you can see a list of your personal QRs and scan one of it. Personal QR can be used for accessing to your personal information such as list of medicine,instruction...

nfc.title: NFC
nfc.content: Here you can see a list of your personal NFCs and scan one of it. Personal NFC tag can be used for accessing to your personal information such as list of medicine,instruction...

status.title: Status user
status.content: It shows the real state of the user; 'active' means there is a valid subscription, otherwise it will appear 'Not active'.

emergency.title: Emergency
emergency.content: Send an emergency alert directly from the app without using the charm

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: In this section you can modify your personal informations and pair the device

faq.title: FAQ
faq.content: A collection of the most frequently asked question, so if you have a doubt check it

menu.title: Menu symbol
menu.content: You can visit other sections by clicking it

show-alert.title: Alert Page
show-alert.content: This is the page shown when you send an emergency alert

immediate.title: Fast!
immediate.content: Clicking it you'll send immediately the emergency alert, without waiting 20 seconds

pin.title: Pin Boxs
pin.content: Insert the PIN to avoid the app to send alert

test-device.title: Device Page
test-device.content: This page is to test the battery of your jewel

battery.title: Battery Test
battery.content: Click this button and check the battery. We suggest to test it at least once per month

TOUR.end: Tour ended. Enjoy using our app!

ALERT.permission_creating_device: For a better registration we'll use the location
ALERT.geo_permission: This app needs location access for all the time. Allow it so this app can work properly
ALERT.internet_permission: This app needs internet connection, enable it!

registration.success: Successfully registered. Check your email and finalize the registration, then back in the app and login
registration.user_already_present: The e-mail is already registered. Log in with snap4city

form.checkbox: You must accept all policy to sign-up

registration.check: Check your email with your credentials

ALERT.ble_scan_err: Scan not working if bluetooth is off
ALERT.device_connected_succ: Properly connected. Stop keep press the button
ALERT.no_device_paired: You have to pair a device, you can do it clicking the icon in the top right
ALERT.error_import_contacts: Can't import contact. Enable the permission
ALERT.protectedAppCheck: Detected device limitations. Select 'No restrictions' so this app can work properly
ALERT.notification_test_battery: Remember that you need to test the battery of your jewel if it still works!
ALERT.ble_disable: App can't detect your emergency alert without bluetooth!

NOTIFICATION.receive_alert: False alarm? Click to open the app and insert PIN to disable alert
